entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Wreckhouse
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wreckhouse 11:30 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Wind: SE 36 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Rain showers beginning before morning. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 4.
